Worthless Gifts

09 Jan 2012
For The Person Who Has Everything

For the person who has everything Nothing is a perfect present. Amusing for about 5 seconds. And someone actually bough this for £5.99?

Stitch-up! Quilt That Costs £350 To Make

Nice article in the Metro about another “scam” that gets you to buy a weekly magazine to make your own quilt. Turns out to be a very expensive quilt. See my related post Build Your Own McLaren F1 Car (it’s a model silly).
